column4: Hey.. I'm befuddled by something. I have a particular domain that I can't connect to. It doesn't matter what network I'm on.. it never works (hasn't for more than a week)
I can resolve it from my iPhone connected to the same Wifi network. Wget can't find it.. traceroute blows up on some part of the route. It ONLY affects my machine
no idea. that's a weird one. maybe a hosts issue? but unlikely unless you messed with them.
